name: Bankless
title: Arthur Hayes reveals his portfolio for 2025 #crypto #investing #trading #stocks #btc #eth
text:
Key Insight
Arthur Hayes maintains a highly concentrated crypto portfolio, with crypto investments representing 95% of his total investment allocation, significantly outweighing his non-crypto investments.

Key Insights
- Hayes reports being 95% invested in crypto assets
- His crypto portfolio primarily consists of Bitcoin and Ethereum
- He also holds significant positions in "lock tokens" and various crypto projects
- His crypto investment bucket is 5-6 times larger than his non-crypto investment bucket
